text:
F. H. LaGUARDIA, Mayor
M. S. NOVIK, Director
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
WNYC
August 23th, 1939
And
Stations
WASJ
WKDX
WBCD
W2XRG
W2XVP
Mr. Prank M. Schooley, Executive Secretary
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
My dear Mr. Schooley;
Since my last letter to you I have been
able to re-arrange my schedule and I am planning to attend
the convention, at the request of Mayor LaGuardia.
At the moment I do not know exactly what time
I shall arrive because my office is still checking the plane
connections. I shall write you again as soon as I have more
definite information.
Very sincerely yours
Director
MSiTjc
-^^>60
"New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
